subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The purse for the 42nd running of the Haskell Invitational on Aug. 2 at Monmouth Park received a quarter-million dollar boost, to $1,250,000.
snippet: The purse for the 42nd running of the Haskell Invitational on Aug. 2 at Monmouth Park received a quarter-million dollar boost, to $1,250,000.
